name: Transformers: War for Cybertron - Autobots
summary: Experience the legendary battle between the Autobots and Decepticons before their exodus to Earth in the untold story of the civil war for their home planet, Cybertron. Two distinct and intertwined campaigns chronicle the Autobots heroism in the face of total annihilation and the Decepticons unquenchable thirst for power. Collect both SKUs to unlock all the Autobot and Decepticon characters. Play as your favorite Transformer characters in the war that spawned one of the most brutal conflicts of all time.
